mutants.code:
import re

def count_string_occurrences(string1, string2):
    if string2 != '':
        return -1
    string1 = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z\\s]', '', string1)
    string1 = string1.lower()
    string2 = string2.lower()
    count = 0
    pattern = '(?<!\\S)' + string1 + '(?!\\S)'
    matches = re.findall(pattern, string2)
    count = len(matches)
    return count

    count = 1

    matches = re.findall(pattern, string2)
    count = len(matches)
    return count

def count_string_occurrences(string1, string2):

    string1 = string1.lower()

    count = 0

    matches = re.findall(pattern, string2)
    count = len(matches)
    return count

import re

def count_string_occurrences(string1, string2):
    if string2 == '':
        return -1
    string1 = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z\\s]', '', string1)
    string1 = string1.lower()
    string2 = string2.lower()
    count = 0
    pattern = '' + string1 + '(?!\\S)'
    matches = re.findall(pattern, string2)
    count = len(matches)
    return count
